Question: Farreach Electronic Co.,Limited CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Farreach Electronic Co.,Limited

CES 2024 Product Highlight

- Launched hundreds of fashion accessories products annually
- Dual protection design concept for enhanced safety
- Premium materials for improved performance, durability, and aesthetics
- 1-year warranty on all products
- Specializes in consumer electronics and digital accessories
- Offers free and professional design services for cable products
- 100% QC inspection for product quality control
- Responsive, friendly, and helpful customer support
- Main sales markets: North America (45%), Europe (35%), South America (10%), Asia (5%), Domestic (5%)
- Contact: Tel: +86-756-8699660, Fax: +86-756-8699663, E-mail: sales-3@jib-tech.com, Add: No.6 Chuangye Road Est., Shuanglinpian Zone, United Harbour Industrial Area, Zhuhai, Guangdong, China
Summary_cn:
远程电子有限公司

CES 2024 产品亮点

- 每年推出数百款时尚配件产品
- 双重保护设计理念，提升安全性
- 优质材料，提高性能、耐用性和美观性
- 所有产品均享有1年保修期
- 专注于消费电子产品和数码配件
- 提供免费且专业的电缆产品设计服务
- 100% 质量控制检验确保产品质量
- 响应迅速、友善和乐于助人的客户支持
- 主要销售市场：北美洲（45%）、欧洲（35%）、南美洲（10%）、亚洲（5%）、国内（5%）
- 联系方式：电话：+86-756-8699660，传真：+86-756-8699663，邮箱：sales-3@jib-tech.com，地址：中国广东珠海市联港工业区双林片区创业路东6号
